content: Sotto la cappa del camino câ€™era un vecchio contadino che suonava la chitarra, bim bum sbarra.
translations: eng:Eeny, meeny, miny, moe, catch a tiger by his toe, if he hollers let him go, eeny, meeny, miny, moe. My mother told me to
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by riccioberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
